name: vImage_AffineTransform
desc: A structure for values that represent an affine transformation.

items.name: init(a: Float, b: Float, c: Float, d: Float, tx: Float, ty: Float)
var a: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [1,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var b: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [1,2] in the matrix.

items.name: var c: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [2,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var d: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [2,2] in the matrix.

items.name: var tx: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [3,1] in the matrix.

items.name: var ty: Float
items.desc: The entry at position [3,2] in the matrix.
